name: imparity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not being equal or similar, especially in a way that is not fair, or an example of this : gender imparity The issue of gender imparity in technical fields is complex. They continue to discuss how racial imparities affected the response to the hurricane. This may provide an opportunity for local food producers to promote their products and to dispel price imparity perceptions.
More examplesFewer examplesThis marked imparity was previously noticed by several observers. They highlighted the imparity between the rising wealth of the retired population and the reduced earning power of the youngest workers.
